alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick and northwestern Butler Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kechi, or near Park City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Benton and Kechi. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 14 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
